data.title: 50 Whodunit classics? Collectors edition
data.meta_description: Disc 1 --Side A: New adventures of Sherlock Holmes. The case of the Cunningham heritage / produced and written by Sheldon Reynolds ; directed by Jack Gage ; director of photography, Raymond Clunie ; film editor, George Gale ; music, Paul Durant ; based on characters created by Sir Arthur Conan Dolye (1954 : 30 min.) --New adventures of Sherlock Holmes. The case of Lady Beryl / produced by Sheldon Reynolds ; screenplay by Lou Morheim ; directed by Steve Previn ; director of photography, Raymond Clunie ; film editor, George Gale ; music, Paul Durand (1954 : 30 min.) --Murder once removed / Metromedia Producers Corporation ; produced by Bob Markell ; written by Irving Gaynor Neiman ; directed by Charles Dubin ; director of photography, Robert C. Moreno ; editor, Jack McSweeney ; music, Robert Drasnin (1971 : 76 min.) --The Amazing exploits of the Clutching Hand. Who is the Clutching Hand / directed by Albert Herman ; screenplay by Leon D'Usseau, Dallas Fitzgerald (1936 : 20 min.) --Shadows --The Moonstone / Monogram Pictures Corp. ; directed by Reginald Barker ; screenplay by Adele Buffington ; photography, Robert Planck ; editor, Jack Ogilvie ; based on the novel by Wilkie Collins (1931 : 47 min.) --Great guy / Grand National Films ; produced by Douglas Maclean ; directed by John B. Blystone ; written by Henry Johnson ; based on the Saturday Evening Post stories by James Edward Grant (1936 : 70 min.). Disc 1 --Side B: The Sell out / Warner Bros ; produced by Josef Shaftel ; directed by Peter Collinson ; screenplay by Murray Smith (1975 : 102 min.) --Crime boss (aka I familiari delle vittime non saranno avvertiti) / Claudia Cinematografica ; produced by Gino Mordini ; directed by Alberto de Martino ; written by Lucio Battistrada, Alberto de Martino (1972 : 90 min.) --The Amazing exploits of the Clutching Hand. The invisible enemy / directed by Albert Herman ; screenplay by Leon D'Usseau, Dallas Fitzgerald (1936 : 20 min.) --The Amazing exploits of the Clutching Hand. A cry in the night / directed by Albert Herman ; screenplay by Leon D'Usseau, Dallas Fitzgerald (1936 : 20 min.) --Ace Drummond. Where east meets west / Thunderbird Films ; directed by Beebe Ford and Cliff Smith ; screenplay by Wyndam Gittens, Norman S. Hall, Ray Trampe ; photography, Richard Fryer ; editors, Edward Todd, Alvin Todd, Louis Sackin (1936 : 20 min.) --Ace Drummond. The doorway of doom / Thunderbird Films ; directed by Beebe Ford and Cliff Smith ; screenplay by Wyndam Gittens, Norman S. Hall, Ray Trampe ; photography, Richard Fryer ; editors, Edward Todd, Alvin Todd, Louis Sackin (1936 : 20 min.) --The Manipulator (aka African story) / Gold Key Entertainment ; directed by Marino Girolami ; screenplay by Ralph Anders, Mike Conda, Eugene Walker ; cinematography, Mario Fioretti ; film editors, Rosalba Sensi, Franca Silvi ; music, Francesco de Masi (1971 : 90 min.).
